Classes in edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc used by edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc
DocConfig
          An object representation of the doc_config.xml descriptor file that a BackEndLSP built on the sdarts.backend.doc package uses to configure itself.
DocFieldDescriptor
          A configuration class describing how a field is found in a document.
DocSearchEngine
          An abstract interface representing a search engine used by a DocBackEndLSP to index and access its collection.
 

Classes in edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc used by edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc.lucene

Classes in edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc used by edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.impls.text
DocBackEndLSP
          An abstract BackEndLSP designed to use a search engine to index and access a collection of local, unindexed documents.
DocConfig
          An object representation of the doc_config.xml descriptor file that a BackEndLSP built on the sdarts.backend.doc package uses to configure itself.
DocSearchEngine
          An abstract interface representing a search engine used by a DocBackEndLSP to index and access its collection.
